name: Bibi & Tina: Das große Reiterfest
overview: The first great Wii game for all horse lovers! Here the dream of horseback riding comes true and thanks to the child-friendly controls and age-appropriate level design, fast-paced fun is guaranteed for young and old. Versatility and activity are in demand! A big riding festival is being organized at the Martinshof and of course a lot of help is needed to test the riding games and competition courses. In this way, users can prove on different riding courses that they are firmly in the saddle and are ahead of the game when riding. It's also about jumping on the trampoline, throwing cans, decorating cakes, balancing, feeding ducks and throwing horseshoes - because only the best get hold of the golden horseshoes, with which all tracks and horses can be unlocked.
